inn1.comm: gets it to rise up straightaway and Amla hops and fends it wide of second slip
this one fizzes past the right hander who sways backwards to evade it, loopy bouncer really
firm cut but straight to point, that raced off the bat
moves away from the right hander and he gets an outside edge that rolls to third man
fuller in length on the off stump and he defends to short cover
shuffles and tucks him down to Bravo who's there at deep square leg
full on the stumps and he pushes it softly down to cover
lovely straight drive off the full face of the bat and it beats the bowler and the stump, mid-on gives the chase
stays back and clips him just wide of mid-on for a single
that's a poor delivery, it's short and wide and the lack of pace allowed Amla to get on top of it and pick his spot which was over point and wide of third man
straight on the stumps and patted back to the bowler
pushed just wide of Benn at cover and they scamper a single
short down the leg side and pulled along the ground down to fine leg
continues over the wicket, stays back and defends down the pitch
this is shorter and he fetches it from outside off and pulls along the turf down to deep midwicket
flicked to midwicket and Richards does well to slide and cut it off
he drifts down the leg side and it's easy for Smith as he deflects it down to fine leg
keeps it outside off and he pushes it down to the covers
down the leg side again but he fails to make proper contact so the ball rolls to fine leg
short of a length and he stays back and defends back to the bowler
shuffles to tuck it to the on side but he plays it straight to Gayle at short midwicket
tries to clip it through the on side again but he finds mid-on this time
this time he shows the full face and defends straight to mid-off, Smith's trying to find the gaps but not succeeding
fails once again to put it away, he shuffles too far across and the ball clips his pad and drops on the pitch
gets beside the line and cuts it down to Richards at deep point, he's quite square
this time he beats the bat, the  ball straightens and he pokes his bat out outside off
gets across and punches it straight to cover
stays beside the line and he cuts just wide of cover and sets off for a run
he clips it just wide of mid-on and sets off very quickly, good running as he puts pressure on the fielder
clips it wide of midwicket for a couple
good shot, the ball climbs towards his hips and he clips it over square leg, nobody there, it's four
cuts and tries to beat the gap at point but the fielder does well to slide and intercept it
good attempt! Amla slashes in the air wide of point and Richards falls full length to his right to pull off a blinder but the ball just evades him
down the leg side and he tries to pull but the ball rolls off his pads
shuffles and clips him down to fine leg
stays beside the line and cuts it to third man who's a bit square
class from Amla, he fetches a short ball from outside off and pulls fiercely along the turf wide of midwicket and mid-on
fuller on the stumps and clipped away wide of midwicket
on the stumps again and he opens the face of the bat and angles it down to slip who's wide
excellent delivery on the blockhole and well dug out
chases a full and wide delivery and he gets an outside edge down to third man
comes over the wicket, he bowls it full on middle and he clips it to midwicket
stays back and defends to the off side
comes down the track and that's a low full toss which he squirts wide of cover and the ball goes to the point boundary
clipped towards midwicket
full on the pads and clipped to mid-on
tossed up on off and defended solidly on the front foot
fullish in length on the off stump and defended to the off side
comes down the track and tries to beat the gap at cover but he ends up chopping it to cover
shapes to drive through the covers but he misses it completely and nearly edges to Ramdin
cuts to the off side
gives him a bit of width and he chops it down to the off side
comes down the pitch and he squirts it to mid-off
chopped it on! Tossed up outside off, the ball skids on and Amla expects it to turn as he shapes to cut through the off side, he gets a inside edge on to the stumps
tossed up outside off and driven to cover
tossed up outside off and driven to the off side
driven on the up but straight to cover
cuts but fails to squirt it past the covers
stays back and chips it in the air but the ball drops short of mid-on
gives him width and he places it wide of point
Bravo keeps it tight and Smith gets forward and defends
just short of a length outside off and he opens the face of the bat and angles it to third man
on off and middle and he clips him down to fine leg
good length on middle and leg and he stays back and clips it wide of midwicket, there's a fielder in the deep
tossed up outside off and driven down to mid-off
tossed up on the pads and gently clipped down to short fine leg
quickier through the air and Kallis slashes hard but straight to backward point
all power! Kallis backs away a little, it's a flighted delivery and Kallis launches it over deep extra cover, the ball lands over the second tier
tossed up on middle and off, he pushes it towards cover
pushed to cover again
full on the pads and clipped wide of midwicket for a couple
cramps him for room and Kallis chops it straight to point
tries to drive through the off side but he gets a thick inside edge which beats the keeper and the stumps
bangs it in short and Smith pulls over square leg but Darren Bravo's there to collect it
tries to cut square but Pollard stops it at short third man
wide outside off and punched to deep cover, Darren Bravo's there to pick it up
pushed through quicker and defended back to the bowler
chips down the pitch and pushes it wide of mid-on
tossed up outside off and defended to the off side
gets on his knee and sweeps firmly square on the on side, fine leg didn't see it at all and the ball was always going to find the rope
pushed wide of cover
stays back and defends down the pitch
slashed hard, gives him width and he places it wide of point on the up, safe shot and powerfully hit
full on the off stump and driven down to mid-off
full outside off and driven down to darren bravo at deep extra cover
short of a length and Smith shuffles and clips him down to deep square leg
this one skids through and nearly takes the outside edge as he shapes to push it through the off side
gets forward and punches it down to deep cover
good length on middle and off and clipped down to deep square leg
fullish in length outside off and punched down to deep point
good length on the off stump and punched down to deep point
pushed in front of point and Sammy fields
cuts it straight to point
full and defended to the off side
drops the ball short and he pulls it wide of square leg
chops it down wide of the keeper
comes down the track and punches it wide of cover

Smith takes a middle stump guard and exposes his leg stump, Bravo bowls a yorker on the leg stump line and Smith fails to deflect it away to fine leg, the ball hits the base of the pad and Harper gives it out
solid forward defense straight up
moves across his stumps and punches it wide of point
comes down the pitch and pushes a full delivery across the line down to mid-on
fraction shorter and he punches it to deep cover
opens the face of the bat and dabs it wide of point and sets off
short and a bit wide outside off, he slaps it down to deep point
fuller in length and clipped down to midwicket
gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
fires it full outside off and he jams it out to short cover, Gayle is there
well played! de Villiers comes down the track and makes sure he comes close to the pitch of the ball, places it wide of mid-off, good placement
full on the stumps and defended solidly
tries to slap it through the off side but he ends up chopping it to mid-off
slower ball and full, he gets down and squirts it down to deep point
this one keeps  a bit low as he tries to cut, misses it
drops it short and he pulls him flat down to deep square leg
comes down the track and chops it down to deep point
drops it short again and he opens the face of the bat and angles it to short third man
gets behind the line and punches it down to mid-off
punches it firnmly wide of mid-on and risks the single, the throw is wide at the bowler's end
stays back and defends
he dabs i wide of the keeper and sets off, Ramdin makes a complete mess of the throw and ends up lobbing it high over the bowler, where was he aiming?
gets forward and drives him to long-off
Taylor falls to his left at cover to stop the ball but fumbles
punches it through the covers
clips it towards mid-on but Chanderpaul fumbles and that allows a single
slower ball and he runs it to third man
tossed up outside off and pushed just wide of cover
tries to sweep but misses

just a hint of doubt whether Sammy was in control of the ball long enough after taking the catch, Kallis cuts it on the up towards Sammy at point, the ball travels low and Sammy picks it inches off the turf, he caught it alright but he pushed the ball away after a couple of seconds, not exactly Gibbs in the 1999 World Cup but it looked clean enough on seeing the replay, Kallis lurked around for a few seconds and glanced at the umpire, he was prepared to walk and the umpire just checked with Sammy once again if it was clean - no arguments, settled
tossed up on the stumps and defended
defended solidly again
comes forward and smothers the spin
clipped wide of square leg for a couple
gets forward and punches it to mid-off
fullish outside off and defended to the off side
driven down to long-off
shuffles and clips him down to fine leg
short of a length outside off, looks to cut, misses
fullish on middle and leg, driven straight to midwicket
shortish outside off, chops it through point for a single
pushed off the front foot towards extra cover
tidy stuff, fullish on the off, driven towards extra cover again where Sammy dives to make the save
excellent stuff, shortish again, tries to chop it through point, makes no contact
nicely driven, overpitched by Sammy, gets to the pitch and drives it elegantly past the diving extra cover and wide of mid-off for a boundary
bowls it full on middle and leg, flicked away towards deep square leg for a single
short outside off, slapped away wide of deep cover for a couple more
lands on a good length on the off, makes room and pushes it towards mid-off
targeting middle there, gets across, turns the face and works it past midwicket for one more
pushed it fuller on the off, driven through the line to long-off for a single
comes  down the pitch and he pushes it to mid-off
slower through the air and pushed to point
comes down the pitch and clips him across the line to midwicket
slower through the air and defended with soft hands
makes room and slashes hard in the air, Chanderpaul does really well to slide to his right and stop it, seemed like a low catch at first
comes well forward and defends
full on the off stump and driven to long-off
opens the face and dabs it to third man
drops it short and he pulls along the turf to deep square
gives him width outside off and he slaps it to deep cover
keeps it on the stumps and he defends to the off side
tossed up outside off and he pushes it to point
tossed up outside off and he gets an outside edge down to short third man
gets forward and drives to cover
tries to dab it down to third man but misses, not a wise shot if u have a slip in place
tossed up on middle and leg and he tucks it to the on  side
gets across and flicks it wide of midwicket
full on the pads and he works it wide of mid-on
gets across and pushes it back to the on side
full on the off stump and pushed to cover
goes across the crease and works it through the line to fine leg
tries to push it through the off side but misses, the keeper is up to the stumps
gives him a lot of width outside off, he reaches out and cuts wide of point
wide outside off again and he cuts, there's a misfield at backward point, rare lapse
full on the off stump, drives on the front foot but Gayle is there to cut it off at short extra cover
fullish on the stumps and pushed wide of the bowler
slower delivery and he fails to make contact
too late on the shot and he's beaten again
de Villiers makes a bit of room to crash it through the off side but he finds mid-off
drops it in front of mid-off with soft hands and sets off quickly, direct hit at the bowler's end but Petersen is a little lazy in grounding his bat, that was close!
Petersen exposes his stumps and tries to hoick it across the line but ends up getting a thick edge onto his body
full on the stumps and worked towards long-on
fires it on the blockhole and he squirts it out to long-off
slower ball outside off and driven forcefully down to long-off
full on the pads and he pushes it through the line to long-on
drops it a bit too short and there's not much pace in that, sat up nicely for de Villiers to pull it over midwicket
comes down the pitch and he ends up hitting it  back to the bowler and hurries back to the crease
fullish and driven down to long-off
chopped on again! Pollard gets it to angle inwards, Petersen tries to dab it towards third man  but the ball skids through and takes the inside edge, not the best choice of shot
drops it short and he hops and fends it wide of the keeper, sets off for a quick single
on the pads and he shuffles and clips him down to square leg
overpitched on the stumps and he drives off the full face of the bat down the ground
bangs it in short and Miller safely ducks under it
stays beside the line and angles it just wide of backward point, hurries the first and completes the second comfortably
full outside the off stump and he squirts it out to point
on the blockhole and dug out just wide of the bowler
drops it short on seeing him come down the track, de Villiers checks his shot and places it to long-on
good length on the stumps and he opens the face of the bat and places it to point
slower ball and Miller tucks it gently in front of short fine leg
slower ball outside off and pushed towards point
on the pads and he clips it across the line for a single
the quicker bouncer this time and Miller tries to slash over the keeper but he's beaten for pace
as straightforward as it can get, Taylor bangs it in short again, this time down the leg side, Miller can't resist the pull but the ball lobs off his glove and Ramdin knew instantly he was history
short again and Botha moves across his stumps and meets the ball high on the body, it drops in front of the stumps
persists with the short stuff, Botha ducks into it, well bowled
the slower ball this time, clever change of pace and Botha pushes it back to the bowler
full on the stumps and he gets off the mark with a gentle clip to midwicket
the slower ball and he moves across and squirts it to fine leg
Pollard changes his action and hides the seam, the ball is driven to mid-off but Rampaul makes a mess of it
short and pulled along the ground, deep midwicket cuts it off
cuts back in after pitching and the  batsman watchfully lets it go
drops it with soft hands in front of cover and sets off
slower and fuller, pushed through the line to long-on
pushed just wide of the bowler and Bravo flings himself to his right to try and cut it off
gets beside the line and he punches it through the off side
drops it in front of the stumps with soft hands, tells his partner to stay back
keeps it on the stumps, de Villiers is happy to clip it down to midwicket for a quick single
slower ball on the pads and he whips it just wide of midwicket, slight fumble
comes down the track and clips a low full toss on the pads, that's his fifty! Workmanlike though, now he should look to accelerate
tossed up outside off and Botha thinks about playing a shot but decides to leave it
this one skidded through but he got enough bat on it to angle it to third man
full outside off and driven to long-off
pushes a low full toss down to short cover
long time coming! Benn makes the mistake of dropping it too short, de Villiers picks the length early and goes across his stumps and hammers it over deep midwicket
flicked to midwicket and there's an overthrow off the direct hit at the bowler's end
taps it to the off side and sets off for a quick single
de Villiers moves within the crease to distract the bowler, he pushes the ball to deep cover
de Villiers loses his footing and falls down on trying to dig out a full delivery, he's ok, direct hit at the bowler's end
full on the pads and whipped just wide of midwicket
stays back and punches it towards cover
bowls it straight on the off stump and Botha defends, tight bowling
de Villiers charges down and ends up swatting a short delivery to mid-on, that was like a forehand
slower ball and he tucks it to midwicket
full on the pads and pushed down the pitch
this one comes back in off the seam, he defends to the off side

oh dear! Botha's bleeding! The ball shoots up after pitching and Botha doesn't evade the bouncer on time and the ball hits the edge of the bat first and thuds onto his helmet, the ball is wedged between the grill and the peak of the helmet, his left eye was hit and he took off his helmet and there was blood streaming down his face, he's walking off the field, he'll be ok
bangs it in short and McLaren ducks under the bouncer down the leg side
makes room and he punches it off the front foot to cover
comes forward and drives him down to long-off
tossed up outside off and driven back to the bowler
clips a full delivery down to deep square leg
fired in quicker and he clips it to midwicket
low full toss and he pushes it to long-on
tries to pull him away but gets a bottom edge which drops in front of a diving Ramdin
that's a low full toss and he pushes it towards deep cover
short and he angles it wide of fine leg
shuffles and clips a short of a length delivery down to fine leg
good length outside off and punched towards cover
shuffles across his stumps and takes a single to deep square leg
slower ball on the stumps and pushed towards cover
tucks him up for room and he ends up defending to the off side
tight stuff again by Pollard, McLaren can only defend back to the bowler
Dropped McLaren chases a full delivery outside off and tries to play across the line on the front foot, the ball travels low to Pollard but he fluffs it
that drop didn't cost anything! Pollard pitches it up outside off and McLaren gets forward and ends up spooning it low to Richards at short cover
bowls it short and Steyn fends it back to the bowler, that;s a wicket maiden
drives a full delivery straight to Gayle at extra cover

well done, big man! de Villiers punches a full delivery past the bowler and down to long-off, de Villiers jogs the first run, isn't sure of the second,  Steyn steps out of his crease for the second run but there's no communication, de Villiers too ambles out of his crease, then turns around but it was too late as Benn's throw shattered the middle stump
this one keeps low and nearly takes out the off stump
Rampaul bangs it  in short and gets it to angle inwards again, nearly gets an outside edge
yorker! See ya later! Rampaul fires an inswinging yorker and Steyn plays all over it, the ball hits the leg stump
he fends off a short ball down to backward point and an agile Sammy slides and cuts it off, great commitment
fires a full delivery low on his pads and he clips it down to fine leg
Morkel just didn't see that slower bouncer, didn't offer a shot
the field is up and Morkel exploits that, he scoops a pitched up delivery over mid-off, much needed four
ends the over with a short one, Morkel tries to pull but misses
length ball on the leg stump and whipped to Pollard at midwicket who fumbles
makes room and carves the ball over the infield on the off side, three men give chase
good length outside off and he makes room and flat bats it over extra cover, Pollard attempts a superman attempt to fall backwards and pull off a blinder
full on the pads and pushed down to mid-on
length ball and slower in pace, Morkel attempts a forehand cross court but finds mid-=on
full on the pads and clipped down to Gayle at midwicket
comes down the pitch and he whips it down to square leg
full and wide outside off and Morkel's square drive bisected the gap between cover and point perfectly

SA in danger of not playing out 50 overs here, Morkel plays a front-foot pull over midwicket and nearly clears the rope, Darren Bravo jogs to his left and takes it comfortably but inches from the rope
slower delivery and Botha pushes it towards cover
slower delivery and he pushes it towards cover
slower ball and he chops it towards cover, good fielding by Richards
good reflexes by Bravo! Botha spoons a full delivery back to the bowler, it was hit firmly and Bravo barely had time to react but he cupped his hands just over his head and took it

inn2.comm: starts off with a good length ball outside off, slight away movement before reaching the keeper
great running! He drops the ball in front of mid-off and sets off very quickly
he gets beside the line and angles it wide of point, follows  the movement of the ball
fullish in length outside off and he defends to the off side
full outside off and Gayle checks his flick across the line, the ball rolls to short midwicket
full and driven firmly off the front foot to mid-off, the crowd expect a boundary
not quite short enough to pull, he swings and the ball hits the top of his pads
stays behind the line and punches him wide of cover
lazy shot there, chased a wide delivery while staying rooted to the crease
angles the ball wide of point and times the ball very well
good length outside off and defended to the off side
this time the pull comes off well,short of a length and he picks the length early and swivels and keeps it along the ground wide of midwicket
good running again, taps it with soft hands in front of point and gets off the blocks
the off cutter this time and he gets an inside edge to the on side
no slip and that's four! It didn't look like a deliberate shot, Gayle was squared up at his crease outside the off stump, genuine edge wide of the keeper
defended and there's nobody attacking the ball on the off side so Gayle steals a single, Steyn's frustrated
Richards tries to slam that over the bowler's head but misses it completely
stays right behind the line and defends
stays at the crease and tries to punch through the off side, ends up chopping it to cover
defended but the ball suddenly kicks up and rolls behind the behind, Gayle didn't really see that
stays at the crease and taps it towards point
this one keeps low and catches the batsman unaware, manages to keep it out
angled on the pads and clipped down to deep square leg
angles across the left hander and Gayle opens the face and places it just wide of of point
Richards jumps at the crease and forcefully punches it away but can't pierce the offside field
bangs it in short and Richards sways out of the way
Steyn over exerts himself, the bouncer beats the batsman and keeper and Amla does well to slide at the rope but the ball beats him

Dropped: And it's Steyn himself, the slower ball, the ball stopped on Richards as he tried to play straight, he checked his shot in the end and Steyn got his hands behind the ball on the follow through but fluffed it, he's in pain
angled towards the body and he clips it wide of midwicket
take that! Langeveldt drops it short and Gayle picks the length early and clubs it with brute force over deep midwicket, into the second tier

the six is followed by a poor shot! Langeveldt bowls it on a good length and angles it across the left-hander, Gayle stays rooted to the crease and slashes, gets a top edge which Kallis cups over his head at first slip
Chanderpaul is beaten first up, the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
gives him width outside the off stump but Chanderpaul doesn't oblige with a shot
gets beside the line and taps the ball down to point
gets beside the line and taps the ball down to short cover
another poor shot by Richards, outside the off stump and he slashes and misses
this time he connects with the off drive but it's an outside edge which beats second slip and runs to third man
stays behind the line and defends
bangs it in short but it's down the leg side, no shot offered
another short one but this time directed at the body, Chanderpaul shuffles across but decides to play it at the last minute, tucks it to the on side
left alone outside the off stump
slower ball and he shuffles across and tucks it to the on side
a fraction short and he shuffles and clips it wide of midwicket
bit of width outside off and he tries to slap it past the infield but he finds backward point
angled across the left-hander but defended to mid-off
stays back and tucks it down to midwicket
shuffles and clips it down to short fine leg off the pads
the bouncer this time and Richards doesn't offer a shot
drifts on the pads and moves across and clips him down to fine leg
shuffles across his stumps and he places it wide of midwicket
he has a bit of room to cut and he pushes it firmly but he finds backward point
too close to cut and Richards was nearly a goner
full on the pads and he works it away wide of square leg and midwicket
he shoulders arms to the keeper
authoritative! Langeveldt drops it short and Richards swivels early and clubs it over deep square leg, there was a fielder at the deep but it was well over him
gets forward to defend but the ball hurries on to him
on the pads and he clips it to deep midwicket
keeps a bit low and he gets behind the line and defends
full on the off stump and he drives wide of extra cover
cuts back in and he places it to the off side
gets across his stumps and pushes it back to the bowler
the ball skids onto him outside off, he tries to cut but gets an outside edge which shoots past second slip
full on the pads and Richards whips it in the air just out of midwicket's reach
class! Pitched up on middle and leg, Richards stays at the crease and in in swift follow through sends the ball sailing over mid-on, stand and deliver, off the meat of the bat
defends to the off side
lands outside off and he shuffles and tucks it to midwicket
lands outside off and he safely shoulders arms

terrific catch and it's Kallis again! Poor shot by Richards, he hangs his bat out hoping to dab it down to third man but plays it almost off the face of the bat to give catching practice to slip, Kallis falls to his left and cups it with both hands on the dive
gets across his stumps and leaves the ball alone, just like Lara
defended to the off side
close call, Chanderpaul defends but the ball hits the keeper's boots and de Villiers whips off the bails but Chanderpaul gets back
clips him wide of midwicket and Chanderpaul hurries back for two
low full toss and Chanderpaul clips it wide of midwicket
gets across and defends to the off side
works it down to midwicket
that was plumb! Morkel comes round the wicket and fires it on a good length, Bravo's beaten for pace and the ball thuds his pads in front of middle, easy one for Harper
gets beside the line and he taps it towards backward point
this one kicks up a bit and Bravo jumps at the crease and places it wide of backward point
lands outside off and the batsman lets it go
keeps it straight and on the stumps, Chanderpaul defends solidly
goes right across his stumps and tucks it to the on side
shuffles across his stumps and clips it to the on side
close call for Bravo as he moves far across and tucks it off his pads to fine leg, almost an lbw
kicks up outside off and he slaps it straight to backward point
slower ball and he moves far across and places it between fine leg and square leg, pushes for the second run
drops it short and he pulls past square leg
places it just wide of cover and he sets off quickly
stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
hops at the crease and he taps it to the off side
defended to the off side
banged in short outside off, defends it to the off side
banged in short outside off, defends it to the off side again, Morkel's persisting with the shorter stuff and it's working
gives him a bit of width and he chops it down to point
moves across his stumps and he tucks it to midwicket
quick one, Chanderpaul ducks under that bouncer
angled across the stumps and he pushes it down to point
strays a bit down the leg side but Bravo was already across his stumps so that wasn't called a wide
comes round the wicket and he cuts it to third man
gives him a bit of width and he angles it down to third man
bowls it short of a length and Chanderpaul cannot chop it past point
comes back in towards the left-hander and he defends
keeps it tight, defended again
cramps him for room again, defended, great stuff from Morkel, something's gotta give for West Indies
just strays on the pads and he clips it uppishly down to fine leg
tucked towards lone leg and the fielding is a bit slack, allows Bravo to come back for the second
clips it to the on side but finds midwicket
short of a length and he clips it down to deep midwicket
opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
gets behind the line and punches off the front foot to cover
comes round the wicket, tossed up outside off and he pushes it wide of cover
tossed up on the pads and pushed through the line to long-on
close call! He taps the ball to point and Kallis has a shy at the bowler's end and had he hit Chanderpaul would have gone
tossed up on the pads and pushed through the line to long-on
comes down the pitch and it's a low full toss clipped to long-on
tossed up slowly and Bravo comes down the pitch but checks his shot and tucks it to midwicket
moves across his stumps and clips the ball down to fine leg
punches it off the front foot towards Smith at mid-off who's deep and sets off for the run quickly
this one kicks up off the surface and he ducks under it
big blow for West Indies! Poor shot again by a West Indian batsman, comes over the wicket, Chanderpaul tries to run it down to third man despite a slip in place, catching practice for de Villiers
the bouncer greets Pollard and it's a sharp one, just manages to get his eyes off the ball
bangs it in short and he stays back and defends
fullish in length on the off stump and he defends back to the bowler
the ball hurries on to him a bit and he hops and fends to the off side
short again and he taps it to the off side
a bouncer and Pollard ducks under it
taps it towards cover point and sets off, direct hit at the bowler's end but he's home
this one skids through outside off and beats him
lands it outside off and he safely lets it go
angling in on middle and leg and he works it to the on side
clips it to the on side again
good take by de Villiers! Down the leg side and the ball clips his pads and nearly runs for four but de Villiers stops it
drives it down to long-on
short of a length outside off and angled to the off side
opens the face and places it down to third man
risky run, Pollard whips it towards mid-on and sets off, the throw misses the stumps at the bowler's end but the backing up is good
tries to run it down to third man but misses

brute of a delivery from Steyn! He bangs it in short and gives Bravo no option but to play at it, he takes his eyes off the ball, the ball lobs off his glove and de Villiers takes it easily, bowler and keeper know and Harper takes his time before giving it out
greets him with a bouncer and Sammy ducks under it
clips it to the on side
this one cuts back in and tuck him up a bit, but he manages to push it back to the bowler
mistimed to the on side
quick bouncer this time and he ducks under it
this one is short and he tries to pull but he swishes at thin air
full on the stumps and pushed down the ground to long-on
holds its line after pitching and beats Sammy who pokes his bat out
Sammy slashes at it and makes no contact, the frustration is showing
another punch meets thin air, Sammy is beaten for pace again
he expects it to bounce a lot more and ducks but the ball hits his body and lobs away
short one again and he ducks under this one
Sammy's all at sea so far, ducks again and the ball lobs off his body
bowls it short of a length and he turns i to square leg
that's the Sammy we know! McLaren bowls it short of  a length and Sammy picks  the length early and biffs a flat six over deep square leg
flicks it down to fine leg
short and down the leg side but or some reason he doesn't call it a wide
he tucks it to short midwicket and sets off, there' a collision between Sammy and McLaren but he makes the crease
full and driven down to the covers
tossed up on middle and worked to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg and turned down to fine leg
tries to run it down to third man but misses
tossed up on middle and leg and turned to the on side
flicks it down to deep square leg
stays back and defends
hops at the crease and fends it off to the on side
McLaren lose his radar and bowls the slower ball down the leg side
classic inswinging yorker, had Sammy digging it out and almost losing his balance
swivels and pulls over short square leg but it will only be a single
full and quick and driven forcefully down to mid-off, scampers the single
the slower ball and he places it down to short third man
full on the pads and he plays a punchy drive off the front foot down to long-on

the change in bowling works! Langeveldt bowls a good length ball outside off and Pollard has the width to work with but he fails to keep it down, he punches it on the up and Petersen takes it easily at backward point
he bangs it in short and he ducks under the bouncer
fuller delivery and he pushes it back to the bowler
fuller delivery on the pads and he flicks it down to deep square leg

West Indies are losing the plot fast, Langeveldt fires it in full and fast outside off, Sammy shapes to drive, the bat hits the ground and the ball takes the outside edge close to the toe of the bat, de Villiers moves to his right and takes it

looking at an early finish here, full and pushed towards mid-on off the full face of the bat, sets off for the run but doesn't show much urgency, Steyn moves to his left and aims at the stumps at the bowler's end, the third umpire is called upon and Sammy is a few inches short
fullish and pushed down towards mid-on
shapes to pull but gets a thick under edge past the stumps and the keeper
short and he pulls and gets a top edge which drops in front of fine leg
full on the pads and clipped to long-on
stays at the crease and defends
pitches outside leg on a full length and hits his pads, cannot be given out lbw
short and he pulls flat but short of the fielder
bowls it on a good length outside off, pushes it towards long-on for a single
targeting middle and off, gets on the front foot and defends it back to the bowler
a hint of reverse there, fullish on the off, gets across and chips it past midwicket for a single
shortish on the off, slower ball, dabbed towards point
banged it short on middle, tried to pull it through square, didn't make any contact
full toss outside off, punched through extra cover for a couple of runs
pushes it towards middle and leg, gets outside the line to dab it into the leg side
flighted on middle, knocked down into the leg side
pitched up on middle, flicked away towards deep square leg
gets the leading edge as he closes the face too early, lands on a good length on the off, falls in front of point
comes round the wicket, pitches it full on middle, drilled towards deep midwicket for a single
pushed down the ground to long-on to keep the strike
opens the face and angles it just wide of backward point
fullish on the pads and he clips it in the air towards long-on
Benn stays at the crease and chops it hard on the pitch
Benn swivels and pulls along the ground down to deep midwicket
there were about four men running after that but it was Kallis who made a good attempt running forward from third man, the ball just dropped short of him, funny old top edge from Benn
Benn stays at the crease and clubs this one over midwicket, one bounce and four
pushes it back to the bowler
makes a bit of room and cuts just wide of short third man
gets forward and places it to short third man
Benn tries to improvise and angle it wide of point but he cant beat the infield
makes room and shovels it to long-on
works it down to backward square leg
Benn tries to shovel one over midwicket  but doesn't get anywhere near the pitch of it
action replay.. is he watching another ball?
three out of three, Morkel needs to hit the stump if he wants something out of that
this time he finally connects but doesn't get the elevation over midwicket and McLaren does well to run forward from deep midwicket and takes it on the fall
short of a length outside off and he slashes hard and misses
tossed up on middle and pushed to the off side
gets forward and pushes it to mid-off
he lets it go to the keeper
full on the middle stump and driven to long-off
driven down to long-off
clipped to midwicket
full on the off stump and pushed to mid-off
fires it on the blockhole and and he digs it out
he gives him a bit of width outside off and Rampaul times the punch really well and beats backward point
short of a length and he defends down to the covers
keeps it on middle and Rampaul defends right in front of the stumps
formalities are over and South Africa have won the series! Rampaul backs away and gets a top edge over cover, Botha runs backwards and takes the catch comfortably
